name: In Search of the Putt Hole
name_original: In Search of the Putt Hole
description:
It's tee-off time but where has the hole gone? Be guided only using the hints of 'warmer' or 'colder' with each stroke as you search for the hole.

Nicole Lawson - Art, Animation, Music

Yuki Lu - Art

Shane Trewartha - Design, Programming

Craig Brown - Programming, Design
